entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 AM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023
